short_summary: Delivering 80 Cable Housings assemblies for the CT-6 APR
description: The Department of National Defence holds a requirement for 80 Cable Housings assemblies that meet GSIN N1670 specifications for use at the Canadian Army Advanced Warfare Center.
duration_in_months: You are an expert AI assistant.
full_summary:
## Replenishment of CT-6 APR Power Cables
### Solicitation for Proposal
[Reference Number: cb-5870-14572182, Solicitation Number: W8485-247641/A]

#### Key Dates
* Publication Date: 2023-05-25
* Tender Closing Date: Not eligible to bid for this opportunity as it has expired on 2023-06-27T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-06-27
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-31

#### Tender Information
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Open Bidding
* Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price

#### Order Details
* Item 1: Cable Housing Assembly, April (APR), CT-6
  + Quantity: 80
  + Unit of Issue: Each (EA)
  + Delivery Location: Canadian Army Advanced Warfare Center (CAAWC) Trenton

#### Important Notice
* Due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, the bid receiving unit is operating with reduced business hours and limited staff. Bidders are strongly encouraged to submit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service.

#### Pre-Qualification
* Bidders are not required to respond to this solicitation if they have been recently convicted of any offense or have been previously suspended, debarred or removed from doing business with the Canadian government.

#### Additional Requirements
* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Point of Contact
* Name: Dany Lebel
* Email: [dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (000) 000-0000

#### Document Attachments
* A copy of the bid solicitation document is available on the CanadaBuys web portal. [Refer to Attachment for more information](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5870/w8485-247641-bid-solicitation-cp-en1_0.pdf).
